## SecretV1 Resource Properties {#properties}

To learn more about resource properties and how to use them, see [Inputs and Outputs]({{< relref "/docs/intro/concepts/programming-model#outputs" >}}) in the Programming Model docs.

### Inputs

The SecretV1 resource accepts the following [input]({{< relref "/docs/intro/concepts/programming-model#outputs" >}}) properties:





<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Acl</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="#secretv1acl">Pulumi.<wbr>Open<wbr>Stack.<wbr>Key<wbr>Manager.<wbr>Inputs.<wbr>Secret<wbr>V1Acl<wbr>Args</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Allows to control an access to a secret. Currently only the
`read` operation is supported. If not specified, the secret is accessible
project wide.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Algorithm</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Metadata provided by a user or system for informational purposes.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Bit<wbr>Length</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Metadata provided by a user or system for informational purposes.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Expiration</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The expiration time of the secret in the RFC3339 timestamp format (e.g. `2019-03-09T12:58:49Z`). If omitted, a secret will never expire. Changing this creates a new secret.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Metadata</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Dictionary&lt;string, object&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Additional Metadata for the secret.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Mode</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Metadata provided by a user or system for informational purposes.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Human-readable name for the Secret. Does not have
to be unique.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Payload</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The secret's data to be stored. **payload\_content\_type** must also be supplied if **payload** is included.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Payload<wbr>Content<wbr>Encoding</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>(required if **payload** is encoded) The encoding used for the payload to be able to include it in the JSON request. Must be either `base64` or `binary`.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Payload<wbr>Content<wbr>Type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>(required if **payload** is included) The media type for the content of the payload. Must be one of `text/plain`, `text/plain;charset=utf-8`, `text/plain; charset=utf-8`, `application/octet-stream`, `application/pkcs8`.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Region</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The region in which to obtain the V1 KeyManager client.
A KeyManager client is needed to create a secret. If omitted, the
`region` argument of the provider is used. Changing this creates a new
V1 secret.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Secret<wbr>Type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Used to indicate the type of secret being stored. For more information see [Secret types](https://docs.openstack.org/barbican/latest/api/reference/secret_types.html).
</dd>

</dl>

            title="Optional">
        <span>expiration</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The expiration time of the secret in the RFC3339 timestamp format (e.g. `2019-03-09T12:58:49Z`). If omitted, a secret will never expire. Changing this creates a new secret.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>metadata</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Dict[str, Any]</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Additional Metadata for the secret.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>mode</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Metadata provided by a user or system for informational purposes.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Human-readable name for the Secret. Does not have
to be unique.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>payload</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The secret's data to be stored. **payload\_content\_type** must also be supplied if **payload** is included.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>payload_<wbr>content_<wbr>encoding</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>(required if **payload** is encoded) The encoding used for the payload to be able to include it in the JSON request. Must be either `base64` or `binary`.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>payload_<wbr>content_<wbr>type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>(required if **payload** is included) The media type for the content of the payload. Must be one of `text/plain`, `text/plain;charset=utf-8`, `text/plain; charset=utf-8`, `application/octet-stream`, `application/pkcs8`.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>region</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The region in which to obtain the V1 KeyManager client.
A KeyManager client is needed to create a secret. If omitted, the
`region` argument of the provider is used. Changing this creates a new
V1 secret.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>secret_<wbr>type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Used to indicate the type of secret being stored. For more information see [Secret types](https://docs.openstack.org/barbican/latest/api/reference/secret_types.html).
</dd>

</dl>







### Outputs

All [input](#inputs) properties are implicitly available as output properties. Additionally, the SecretV1 resource produces the following output properties:





<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>All<wbr>Metadata</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Dictionary&lt;string, object&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The map of metadata, assigned on the secret, which has been
explicitly and implicitly added.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>Content<wbr>Types</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Dictionary&lt;string, object&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The map of the content types, assigned on the secret.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>Created<wbr>At</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The date the secret ACL was created.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>Creator<wbr>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>

</dd>

    <dt class="property-"

The following state arguments are supported:




<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Acl</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="#secretv1acl">Pulumi.<wbr>Open<wbr>Stack.<wbr>Key<wbr>Manager.<wbr>Inputs.<wbr>Secret<wbr>V1Acl<wbr>Args</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Allows to control an access to a secret. Currently only the
`read` operation is supported. If not specified, the secret is accessible
project wide.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Algorithm</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Metadata provided by a user or system for informational purposes.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>All<wbr>Metadata</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Dictionary&lt;string, object&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The map of metadata, assigned on the secret, which has been
explicitly and implicitly added.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Bit<wbr>Length</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Metadata provided by a user or system for informational purposes.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Content<wbr>Types</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Dictionary&lt;string, object&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The map of the content types, assigned on the secret.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Created<wbr>At</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The date the secret ACL was created.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Creator<wbr>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The creator of the secret.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Expiration</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The expiration time of the secret in the RFC3339 timestamp format (e.g. `2019-03-09T12:58:49Z`). If omitted, a secret will never expire. Changing this creates a new secret.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Metadata</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Dictionary&lt;string, object&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Additional Metadata for the secret.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Mode</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Metadata provided by a user or system for informational purposes.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Human-readable name for the Secret. Does not have
to be unique.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Payload</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The secret's data to be stored. **payload\_content\_type** must also be supplied if **payload** is included.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Payload<wbr>Content<wbr>Encoding</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>(required if **payload** is encoded) The encoding used for the payload to be able to include it in the JSON request. Must be either `base64` or `binary`.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Payload<wbr>Content<wbr>Type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>(required if **payload** is included) The media type for the content of the payload. Must be one of `text/plain`, `text/plain;charset=utf-8`, `text/plain; charset=utf-8`, `application/octet-stream`, `application/pkcs8`.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Region</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The region in which to obtain the V1 KeyManager client.
A KeyManager client is needed to create a secret. If omitted, the
`region` argument of the provider is used. Changing this creates a new
V1 secret.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Secret<wbr>Ref</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The secret reference / where to find the secret.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Secret<wbr>Type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Used to indicate the type of secret being stored. For more information see [Secret types](https://docs.openstack.org/barbican/latest/api/reference/secret_types.html).
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Status</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The status of the secret.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Updated<wbr>At</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The date the secret ACL was last updated.
</dd>

</dl>

    </dt>
    <dd>The secret reference / where to find the secret.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>secret_<wbr>type</span>

    </dt>
    <dd>Used to indicate the type of secret being stored. For more information see [Secret types](https://docs.openstack.org/barbican/latest/api/reference/secret_types.html).
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
